name: Ultra Rainbow Bake Sale
description:
Inspired by Dominion, Magic: The Gathering, Android: Netrunner, rainbows, baking, love, friends.

Help Morgan and Alex raise awareness of high school LGBTQ issues with a bake sale! But, first they need to overcome their self-doubt and other negative emotions.

Build up a deck full of hope, and use that hope to bake some cupcakes before your time runs out!
